titleStmt.title: A case of conscience, concerning the sacrament of the Lords Supper when either the bread or wine is wanting, or when there is a desire, yet with an antipathy to them, or debilitie to receive them / proposed to John Ley ...
titleStmt.author: Ley, John, 1583-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.H. for George Lathum ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
